short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gnosis IQ enables teachers to assist their students proactively!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Parents and teachers are the last to know more often than not, and in some cases, it is too late. Through the power of Gnosis IQ, teachers can identify students who need help in real-time.

Gnosis IQ brings awareness to educators regarding their students' academic health. Students may self-report in their Gnosis IQ journal as often as they prefer. Real-time Gnosis IQ notifications will attempt to alert staff members to the possibility of an at-risk student, or students.
